page.title: 18 Transport - Railways
page.content: Although the railway line in Hooton and Eastham does not pass through our area,the people of Eastham use it to commute to either Chester in one direction or Liverpool in the other.This is because the railway line in Hooton and Eastham runs from Chester to Rock Ferry to Birkenhead, Liverpool and further north. Between Birkenhead and Liverpool, the railway goes underground,running beneath the River Mersey. This section of railway line in our area is in the process of being electrified and we had a school visit from the{British Rail Transport Police who showed us a film and told us about the dangers of playing near railway lines.
